# NETWORK::NETWORK_HAS_BONE_BEEN_HIT_BY_KILLER

## Summary
Returns true if a certain body part of the local Player has been damaged by the player that made that was awarded the fatal blow

## Parameters
* **INT** bone

## Returns
* **BOOL**
